example_sentence_english: It is a pleasure to meet you.

example_sentence_italian: Il piacere della lettura è unico.
example_sentence_english: The pleasure of reading is unique.

example_sentence_italian: I piaceri della vita sono tanti.
example_sentence_english: The pleasures of life are many.

example_sentence_italian: Mi concedo dei piaceri ogni tanto.
example_sentence_english: I allow myself some pleasures sometimes.
We talk about the pleasure of traveling.
We talk about the pleasures of life.
We toast to the pleasure of seeing each other again.
I say no to useless pleasures.
He moves away from worldly pleasures.

example_sentence_italian: Trova pace nel piacere della musica.
example_sentence_english: He finds peace in the pleasure of music.
He gets lost in worldly pleasures.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un saggio sul piacere.
example_sentence_english: I read an essay about pleasure.

example_sentence_italian: Parlo col piacere di essere qui.
example_sentence_english: I speak with the pleasure of being here.
Do not overdo it with pleasures.
